comments.author: Jennifer
comments.content:
You're video is amazing. I have a school project about facial detection, and I'm also using javacv, but with Android. Have you ever worked with both or not, 'cause I would need a bit of help.

Jenny

comments.author: randy
comments.content: Hi Jennifer, I taught myself by using this tutorial: http://note.sonots.com/SciSoftware/haartraining.html. Maybe it can help you too.
